channel.title: 508-525 New Item
channel.description: I added a new Custom Item to My Client and A new Item Id. the Last id in item.cfg was 14605, now its 14609 cz I added Colored Whips like Rs. Everything Loads and Stuff but I want the new Item To have Equip Option, Which it doesnt. So how can i enable Equip Option?

item.title: 508-525 New Item
item.dc:creator: @sonicforce41 sonicforce41
item.description:
@sonicforce41 wrote:

I added a new Custom Item to My Client and A new Item Id. the Last id in item.cfg was 14605, now its 14609 cz I added Colored Whips like Rs.
Everything Loads and Stuff but I want the new Item To have Equip Option, Which it doesnt. So how can i enable Equip Option?

Read full topic
